title: Bruno Loubet’s bean and vegetable chilli
description: The list of ingredients here may look long and daunting but I promise you, the recipe is very simple – a one-pot wonder. This recipe was kindly given to me by a great chef – Bruno Loubet – who worked with me for many years. Risking Bruno’s wrath, I made a few changes to the recipe. I hope he will forgive my boldness and see the wisdom of an older man. This meal, when served as eight portions, provides 359kcal, 9g protein, 46g carbohydrate	(of which 15g sugars), 13g fat (of which 2g saturates), 8g fibre and 1.8g salt per portion.
ingredients: 12g/½oz fresh root ginger, finely grated or sliced
1 red pepper, cut into large dice
1 x 240g tin red kidney beans (drained weight)
40g/1½oz chocolate (100 per cent cocoa solids), finely grated
salt and freshly ground black pepper
